page.title: 02LISSINGTON: POPULATION.JOBS
page.content: Lissington.A small village consisting of a church, Methodist Chapel & Pub.Of the 48 houses 12 are either farmhouses or tied cottages. Population consists of 30 people under 18, 63 working age, 23 retired.25% of families live here because they own or work the land. Other employment:Engineering,Building, Accountancy,Transport,Insurance,Police Teaching,Railway. 13 travel between 4 & 40 miles to work using their own cars. 42% households are long established local families with many relations in the vicinity.Of the 58% who came from outside the immediate area the peacefulness of the countryside and appeal of their particular property compensated for having to commute daily to work.
